channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scaling Requires More Than Bigger Targets
item.description: It requires a different operating model.

item.title: How This City Block Was Designed With Indigenous People in Mind
item.description: Toronto’s Indigenous Hub serves the city’s large Indigenous population by reflecting its values.

item.title: Every U.S. Olympian is going home with $200,000, whether they medal or not, thanks to a billionaire’s $100 million gift
item.description: Financier Ross Stevens’ donation hopes to give athletes more financial security.

item.title: 5 Tips to Successfully Build Your Tech Brand
item.description: A brand can outlive trends, when thoughtfully developed.

item.title: Another apparel brand is closing its retail stores. It was once a tech bro favorite

item.title: Tim Cook calls for de-escalation but avoids criticizing Trump after Minneapolis death
item.description: President Trump is facing a rare bipartisan backlash after a group of federal agents shot and killed protester Alex Pretti in Minneapolis on Saturday....

item.title: Jerome Powell says Fed independence isn’t lost… yet. ‘I certainly hope we won’t’ lose it
item.description: Powell made clear he believes the Fed can remain independent despite attacks from the Trump administration.

item.title: Scott Bessent on the 39% of young Americans thinking favorably of socialism: They’re just not invested in the stock market

item.title: Do virtues like being compassionate increase your well-being?

item.title: Buc-ee’s Expanding to 8 New States: See List of Locations and Opening Dates for Mega Gas Station Chain
item.description: The popular Texas-based chain is growing its footprint with a number of new convenience stores—including a sprawling 76,245-square-foot location.

item.title: Why Adults With ADHD Often Thrive as Freelancers and Entrepreneurs
item.description: It has been eye-opening to understand the link between my ADHD diagnosis and my decision to pursue self-employment.

item.title: The American taxpayer spent nearly half a billion dollars deploying federal troops to U.S. cities in 2025, CBO finds
item.description: Trump's federal troop deployment to U.S. cities is costing about $93 million a month, according to the Congressional Budget Office.
